text: Hum ney raat aur din ko apni qudrat ki nishaniyan banaee hain raat ki nishani ko to hum ney bey noor ker diya hai aur din ki nishani ko roshan banaya hai takay tum apney rab ka fazal talash ker sako aur iss liye bhi kay barson ka shumar aur hisab maloom ker sako aur her her cheez ko hum ney boht tafseel say biyan farma diya hai
